mapper.select: SELECT b.idx, b.title, b.contents, b.views, b.regdate, u.name FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.idx AND b.status = 'A' ORDER BY b.regdate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET views = views + 1 WHERE idx = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, contents, user_no, views, regdate, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, #{userNo}, 0, NOW(), 'A')
